title: Add a new subject from the home page
description: Verifies a user can create a new subject via the add-subject modal and see it listed on the home page.

steps.description: Type "Fizika" into the subject name field
Type "İstilik hadisələrinə qədər" into the topic range field
Verify text "İstilik hadisələrinə qədər" is visible

title: Subject name is required validation
description: Verifies the add-subject modal blocks saving when the subject name is empty and shows a validation message.

steps.description: Verify element "Add subject modal" is visible
Type "" into the subject name field

title: Cancel add-subject modal does not create a subject
description: Verifies closing the add-subject modal without saving does not add a new subject card.

steps.description: Verify element "Add subject modal" is visible
Type "Kimya" into the subject name field
Verify element "Add subject modal" is not visible

title: Delete a subject after confirming in the confirmation modal
description: Verifies a user can delete an existing subject by confirming in the delete confirmation modal.

steps.description: Type "Fizika" into the subject name field
Type "İstilik hadisələrinə qədər" into the topic range field
Click the delete icon on the subject card for "Fizika"
Click the confirm delete button in the modal

title: Delete confirmation modal cancel keeps the subject
description: Verifies cancelling the delete confirmation leaves the subject card intact.

steps.description: Type "Riyaziyyat" into the subject name field
Type "Limitlərə qədər" into the topic range field
Click the delete icon on the subject card for "Riyaziyyat"
Verify element "Delete confirmation modal" is visible

title: Prevent adding duplicate subjects with the same name (if supported)
description: Verifies the UI behavior when attempting to add a subject with a name that already exists (either blocks with message or allows a second card).

steps.description: Type "Fizika" into the subject name field
Type "Bölmə 1" into the topic range field
Type "Fizika" into the subject name field
Type "Bölmə 2" into the topic range field

title: Subject list persists after page reload
description: Verifies subjects saved from the home page remain visible after reloading the page (LocalStorage persistence).

steps.description: Type "Biologiya" into the subject name field
Type "Hüceyrəyə qədər" into the topic range field

title: Generate topic list from AI on Subject Setup and proceed to Topic Editor
description: Verifies that AI-generated topics are displayed on the setup page and can be confirmed to open the topic editor with the topics present.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Verify text "Mövzuları Təyin Et" is visible
Click "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" button
Verify element "Generated topics list" is visible
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible

title: Open Topic Editor from Setup using manual topic selection entry point
description: Verifies that the user can enter the topic editor flow from the setup page without AI generation and reach the topic editor screen.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Verify text "Mövzuları Təyin Et" is visible
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible

title: Add a new topic in Topic Editor
description: Verifies that a user can add a topic and see it appear in the topic list.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Click on "Mövzular" or "Topic Editor" navigation item if present
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible
Type "Yeni Mövzu 1" into "New topic name" field

title: Edit an existing topic name in Topic Editor
description: Verifies that a user can edit a topic and the updated name is shown in the list.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Click on "Mövzular" or "Topic Editor" navigation item if present
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible
Click the edit icon/button next to the first topic in the list
Type "Yenilənmiş Mövzu" into the "Topic name" field

title: Remove a topic from the Topic Editor list
description: Verifies that a user can remove a topic and it no longer appears in the list.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Click on "Mövzular" or "Topic Editor" navigation item if present
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible
Click the remove/delete icon/button next to the first topic in the list
Click "Confirm" button in the remove confirmation (if shown)
Verify text "No topics" is visible or the topic count appears reduced

title: AI topic generation failure shows an error message on Setup page
description: Verifies that when AI generation fails or returns invalid data, the setup page shows a visible error message indicating failure.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Verify text "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" is visible
Click "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" button
Verify text "AI" is visible in an error message
Verify text "uğursuz" or "failed" is visible in an error message

title: From AI error, open manual topic editor and add a topic
description: Verifies that after an AI failure, the user can open the manual topic editor and save topics successfully.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Click "AI ilə Mövzu Siyahısı Yarat" button
Verify text "AI" is visible in an error message
Click the button/link to open the manual topic editor
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible
Type "Manual Mövzu 1" into "New topic name" field

title: Prevent saving an empty topic name
description: Verifies that saving a topic with a blank name is blocked and a visible validation message appears.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subject list
Click on "Mövzular" or "Topic Editor" navigation item if present
Verify element "Topic editor topic list" is visible
Verify text "required" or "Boş" or "doldurun" is visible

title: Plan config blocks generating a plan when exam date is in the past
description: Verifies selecting a past exam date shows a validation error and prevents successful plan generation.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on "Plan" or "Plan Config" in the subject navigation
Verify the exam date picker is visible
Verify text indicating the exam date cannot be in the past is visible

title: Daily plan persists completed state after page reload
description: Verifies completed topics remain marked as completed after refreshing the Daily Plan view.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on "Daily" or "Günlük" in the subject navigation
Click the completion checkbox for the first topic in today's list
Verify the first topic shows as completed
Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on "Daily" or "Günlük" in the subject navigation
Verify the first topic is still shown as completed

title: Unmarking a completed daily topic updates the UI state
description: Verifies a user can toggle a topic from completed back to not completed and the UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on "Daily" or "Günlük" in the subject navigation
Verify today's topics list is visible
Click the completion checkbox for the first topic in today's list to set it completed
Verify the first topic shows as completed
Click the completion checkbox for the first topic again
Verify the first topic is shown as not completed

title: View progress statistics for a subject with existing completions
description: Verifies the Progress page shows visible completion statistics, percent complete, and streak for a subject that already has completed topics.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to already have some completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Streak value is displayed and formatted as a number
description: Verifies the Progress page displays a streak metric that appears as a numeric value (not blank) for a subject with completions.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to already have some completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Progress charts or visual indicators are visible on the Progress page
description: Verifies that the progress visualization area (charts/graph-like indicators) is rendered and visible.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to already have some completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Empty state shown when subject has no completed topics
description: Verifies the Progress page shows an empty-state message when there are no completions for the selected subject.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to have zero completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Empty state shown when subject has no plan configured
description: Verifies the Progress page indicates there is no plan when a subject has not been configured with a study plan.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to have no study plan configured
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Progress page remains readable after scrolling through statistics
description: Verifies that key statistics remain present and visible as the user scrolls through the Progress page content.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to already have some completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation
Scroll to the bottom of the Progress page

title: Progress page loads consistently when re-opening from subject navigation
description: Verifies that navigating away and returning via in-app navigation shows the Progress page content again without missing statistics.

steps.description: Click on a subject in the subjects list that is known to already have some completed topics
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation
Click on "Daily" in the subject navigation
Click on "Progress" in the subject navigation

title: Open AI chat and send a question to receive an answer
description: Verifies the in-subject AI chat can be opened and returns a visible response after sending a question.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on the AI chat open button or assistant area
Type "Nyutonun qanunlarını izah et" into the chat message input field

title: AI chat response shows math formatting when applicable
description: Verifies AI chat displays a response that includes visible math-formatted content when the prompt requests equations.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on the AI chat open button or assistant area
Type "Nyutonun ikinci qanununu formul ilə yaz: F = m*a" into the chat message input field

title: Generate a quiz from a topic card with selected size and difficulty
description: Verifies quiz generation flow from a topic card works and shows questions in the modal.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Scroll to the first topic card in the daily plan list
Click the "Test Yarat" button on a topic card
Select "5" from the number of questions dropdown

title: Complete a generated quiz and submit to see results summary
description: Verifies a user can answer quiz questions, submit, and see a results summary with counts and percentage.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Scroll to the first topic card in the daily plan list
Click the "Test Yarat" button on a topic card
Select "5" from the number of questions dropdown
Click on the first answer option for the first question

title: Quiz modal can be closed after quiz generation
description: Verifies the quiz modal can be dismissed using the close control after questions are shown.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Scroll to the first topic card in the daily plan list
Click the "Test Yarat" button on a topic card

title: Chat input validation: sending an empty message does not create a user message
description: Verifies the chat UI prevents sending a blank message and does not add a new message bubble.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Click on the AI chat open button or assistant area
Click the chat message input field

title: Quiz configuration requires selecting valid options before creation
description: Verifies the quiz modal enforces required selections (size and difficulty) before allowing quiz creation.

steps.description: Click on the first subject in the subjects list
Scroll to the first topic card in the daily plan list
Click the "Test Yarat" button on a topic card
